item.title: Bulletin updated at 17:46 HKT 08/10/2021
item.description:
At 5 p.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 25 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 95 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 0.0
Intensity of UV radiation : low

Please be reminded that:
The Tropical Cyclone Signal No. 3 has been issued.
The Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal was issued at 5:45 p.m.
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 7:00 p.m. today. Thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
The Landslip Warning has been issued.
The Special Announcement of Flooding in Northern New Territories has been issued.
